item.description:
Snob 2nd anniversary Ed..! indeed, our very first Snob Meetup (thanks to Nerd Fun) was May 16 2010..!

 

 

GOOD WEATHER FORECAST for tomorrow --

http://www.timeanddate.com/weather/usa/cambridge/hourly

...SO LEGAL SEA FOODS PATIO IT IS.

"A Pessimist is an informed Optimist"... lets go with this premise.

Optimism... "The doctrine, or belief, that everything is beautiful, including what is ugly... especially the bad, and everything right is wrong. It is held with tenacity by those most accustomed to the mischance of falling into adversity, and is most acceptably expounded with the grin that apes a smile. Being a blind faith, it is inaccessible to the light of disproof-- an intellectual disorder.. it is.. fortunately not contagious" --Ambrose Bierce

Join us yet again for this now legendary Nerd Fun endeavor, in the heart of intellectual snobbery, Harvard Sq. Be there or be Sq.

Note= Legal Sea Foods patio is refreshing on a hot day (there is early shade) but can be chilly on a cool day. Legal Sea foods patio is a "raw bar" located directly in front of the Charles Hotel entrance. It is not the same as the upscale restaurant located at the upper level. At this venue & at Grendels seems there is no pressure to order food..! Limited draft beer selection available.

You don't have to be a genuine Intellectual snob to join. Pseudo-intellectuals are also welcome. All you need is an aloof attitude full of irony and some baffling intellectual ideas or--dare I say it--some unanswered question you wish to convey incognito.

The premise is to share your intellectual baffling snob idea or question on a name tag (provided) and attach such tag to your shirt, OR chuck such idea or question in a basket in our midst which will be provided and passed around (please pass it around!).

Once this deed is done, pluck from the basket & discuss, if appropriate. This may lead to much laughter, but others may be baffled & perhaps enlightened.

Humor in good taste: ALLOWED. Intellectual apparel: allowed. Startle the waitstaff with a fake mustache, goatee, periwig, or monocle. Fold-up sunglasses, corduroy jackets w/ elbow patches: allowed. No Meerschaum tabacco pipes please. Absinthe is not served.

Please bring cash. Separate tabs are not encouraged.

When settling the tab, make sure and add 25% of what you are spending for tax and tip!
item.name: Intellectual Snob Meetup-- Pessimism
